reference.title: Best uses for Speaker Coach
reference.shortdesc: Best practices to get the most our of your Speaker Coach rehearsal report.

sthead.stentry: Works best with only one speaker at a time.

strow.stentry: Technology will improve as it is used more.
Pace, pitch, filler words, pronunciation, originality, inclusiveness, speech refinements, repetitive words, body language. Rehearsal report.
Will not add timing elements to slideshows.
Relax and speak slowly and clearly.
Pause if needed, it will not adversely affect your report.
